org.openimaj.image.analysis.watershed.feature

Class MomentFeature

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.analysis.watershed.feature.MomentFeature
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, ComponentFeature

    public class MomentFeature
extends Object
implements ComponentFeature
    Accumulate the values of u11, u20 and u02 required to fit an ellipse to the feature.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
